thread.section_title: iDriveSafely Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of iDriveSafely | www.idrivesafely.com | 5 of 110
thread.title: ROBERT

author: ROBERT
title: ROBERT
text:
This course is very nicely done. You are able to move through the sections and videos at your own pace, there are periodic quizzes throughout, and it is nice that it is no longer timed. If you can complete the course in a few hours, that is all you the time you have to spend on it. You can also come and go as you please and it saves your progress.
I would recommend this course to anyone who is eligible for traffic school. The only negative is that it requires Flashplayer, which means you can't use it on your iPad, which I initially wanted to do. This meant I had to finish the course at one sitting at my desktop. Turned out to not be a big deal.
